common_issues.title: Copilot Not Responding or Generating Code
common_issues.description: Users report Copilot is continuously loading or returns an error message instead of generating code. This may indicate problems with the Copilot service itself. Users should check for existing bug reports and review relevant documentation. The Pieces Support Team is currently investigating these issues.
